title: Decision-Making Competency Enhancement Program Based on Medical Crisis Management Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic emergency medicine knowledge and leadership experience
context.additional_context: VR simulation training operated in a technology-constrained (smartphone-centric) environment, focusing on developing managerial competencies to handle advanced medical crisis scenarios

learning_goals: Apply a three-step decision-making process in medical crisis situations with 90% accuracy.
Achieve over 80% team efficiency in simulation-based crisis management scenarios by utilizing team leadership techniques.
Identify at least three core actions within 15 minutes in complex medical scenarios using cognitive load minimization strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
